p.span: display graphemes with index 2 and 3 as accented

dd.pre: Tick this box if you want your online corpus to display acute and grave accents (e.g, ú, ù) rather than subscript numerals (e.g., u₂, u₃).
Tick this box if you want your online corpus to display any allographs you have marked in your ATF files.
Tick this box if you want your online corpus to display ḫ instead of h in transliterations.
Use this option to add one or more characters or spaces between adjacent determinatives.

p.span: character before line numbers in transliterations

dd.pre: Use this option to add one or more characters before line numbers in the online transliterations. The default is blank.

p.span: character(s) after line numbers in transliterations

dd.pre: Use this option to add one or more characters after line numbers in the online transliterations. The default is blank.

p.span: set the characters for horizontal rulings

dd.pre: Leave this box blank to display horizontal rulings as simple straight lines. Enter "char" if you want them displayed as text characters (----).

p.span: the character before line numbers in translations

dd.pre: Use this option to add one or more characters before line numbers in the online translations. The default is blank.

p.span: the character after line numbers in translations

dd.pre: Use this option to add one or more characters after line numbers in the online translations. The default is blank.

p.span: the character between line numbers in translations

dd.pre: Use this option to change the character between ranges of line numbers in the online translations. The default is – (en-dash)
